name: USoundNodeEnveloper
doc: Allows manipulation of volume and pitch over a set time period

LoopStart: The time in seconds where the envelope's loop begins.
LoopEnd: The time in seconds where the envelope's loop ends.
DurationAfterLoop: The time in seconds it takes the evelope to fade out after the last loop is completed.
LoopCount: The number of times the envelope should loop if looping is enabled and the envelope is not set to loop indefinitely.
VolumeCurve: The distribution defining the volume envelope.
PitchCurve: The distribution defining the pitch envelope.
PitchMin: The lower bound of pitch (1.0 is no change)
PitchMax: The upper bound of pitch (1.0 is no change)
VolumeMin: The lower bound of volume (1.0 is no change)
VolumeMax: The upper bound of volume (1.0 is no change)
bLoopIndefinitely: If enabled, the envelope will continue to loop indefenitely regardless of the Loop Count value.
bLoop: If enabled, the envelope will loop using the loop settings.
